overview: When three friends take a Scottish motoring holiday they don't expect to end up marooned in a creepy old dark house that is crammed full of kink! Participate in shiny latex fantasies and orgasmic orgies and meet sex-crazed women hell bent on satisfaction. Prepare to be initiated into the house rules by the mansion's mistress - the cruel and beautiful Baroness Kinky! Shot in Edinburgh against a backdrop of the Scottish lochs with a cast of British Hungarian and Ukrainian beauties including fetish diva Zora Banx who are all deliciously directed by the King of Kink - Frank Thring!
title: Secret Delights of Baroness Kinky
